aboutMe.description: As a dedicated and results-driven individual, I possess a unique blend of skills and qualities that enable me to excel in a variety of professional settings. With a strong foundation in honesty and integrity, I am committed to upholding the highest standards of ethics and morality in all my endeavors. I am a collaborative and adaptable team player with excellent communication and interpersonal skills, able to work effectively with diverse groups and individuals to achieve common goals. My creative mindset and problem-solving abilities enable me to approach challenges with a fresh perspective and develop innovative solutions. With my unique combination of skills, experience, and personal qualities, I am confident in my ability to make a positive impact in any organization and contribute to its success.

experience.title: IT Support Learner
responsibilities: Enhanced technical skills through hands-on experience in IT support.
Implemented innovative solutions to optimize system performance.
Developed strong problem-solving skills to quickly identify and resolve issues.
Streamlined IT processes to improve efficiency and productivity.

skills.description: I have 4 years of experience working with HTML. I was first introduced to HTML structure in my third year of high school.
I am actively upskilling myself and learning more and more about CSS daily. CSS is one of the many skills I learned at Life Choices
I am learning more and more about JavaScript daily. JavaScript is one of the many skills I learned at Life Choices

testimonials.name: Mardoqu√©iro D.
testimonials.testimonial: Amy Johnson excels in communication and business management within computer coding. She effectively conveys complex technical concepts and demonstrates a strong work ethic by assisting her peers. Highly recommended for roles requiring technical expertise, communication skills, and leadership.

testimonials.name: Kyle
testimonials.testimonial: Amy is an extremely dedicated worker who always strives to do the best she can. She remains willing to attain new knowledge and works very well in a team. Amy has the ability to create a comfortable atmosphere for those around her and always goes the extra mile when necessary. I highly recommended Amy and I am confident she will exceed your expectations.

testimonials.name: Mapule
testimonials.testimonial: Amy is the real deal! her coding skills are off the charts, whether it's making websites look amazing or handling all the tech stuff behind the scenes. Plus, she's super easy to work with and always bring fresh ideas to the table. Can't recommend her enough!

testimonials.name: Daniel
testimonials.testimonial: Amy is a very hardworking individual and is always committed to the task at hand. She is very creative with her designs and always amazes me by how she brings her ideas to life.

testimonials.name: Joel
testimonials.testimonial: Amy is a highly creative, well-behaved, and dedicated individual who thrives on collaborating with her peers and excels at working on project assignments. She has acquired various skills and tools, including HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, VS Code, and wireframe. I am pleased to introduce her as an exceptional candidate and developer.

projects.description: This was a group project I did for a Node.js End of Module Project. It allowed me to experience working with another individual and helped me pracice collaboration and communication.
The temperature converter converts temperatures from Celcuis to Fahrenheit and vise versa. This was achieved  through combining the use of CSS and JavaScript
This task was done to determine if you are healthy or not but comparing your weight to your height. The activity also tests my skills in HTMl, CSS and Javascript.
I created a to do list app using, HTML(for structure), JavaScript(for functionality) and CSS(for styling)
I designed a portfolio of myself, utilizing HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.
This calculator design helped me undestand the basics of CSS and HTML.
This keyboard design helped me undestand the basics of CSS and HTML.
I designed an e-commerce website of my business to test my skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap.
